meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inconceivable.
meanings.sent1: The inconceivabilities of outer space amazed the young students.
meanings.sent2: Scientists struggle to comprehend the inconceivabilities of quantum mechanics.
meanings.sent3: The inconceivabilities of a cat wearing a hat made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her dreams were filled with inconceivabilities that defied logic.
meanings.sent5: The artist's painting captured the inconceivabilities of the universe in vibrant colors.

meanings.sent1: The book discussed the various inconceivabilities of time travel.
meanings.sent2: The mysteries of the universe are filled with inconceivabilities.
meanings.sent3: The inconceivabilities of a dog playing chess puzzled the onlookers.
meanings.sent4: His success story was an inconceivability just a year ago.
meanings.sent5: The movie portrayed the inconceivabilities of magic in a captivating way.
